DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read all terms of use agreements
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read terms of use agreements on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read all terms of use agreements
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read terms of use agreements on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all terms of use agreements
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read terms of use agreements, without a signed in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write all terms of use agreements
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write terms of use agreements on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read and write all terms of use agreements
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read and write terms of use agreements on your behalf.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all terms of use agreements
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write terms of use agreements, without a signed in user.
